New Layout

So I’ve been playing with a new layout for the site - the colorscheme is based off of the textmate colorscheme ‘molokai’. The overall layout made its way onto github before it made its way into Photoshop, so everything is very rough, ethereal and, hopefully, soon to evolve into something muy muy bueno.

The Thing About Me Is...

You need to make sure you've got your Javascript enabled around me - that's for sure.

I'm the Director of Technology and front-end developer at Custom Channels in Boulder, CO, which is to say that I spend 50+ Hours at week staring at computers. Since I spend so much time working with computers I've got a routine down - I come in in the morning, I open GNU Screen, ViM, CMUS, Chrome and VirtualBox - then I make coffee.

I'm facinated by back-end development even though it isn't my area of expertise. I *attempt* participate heavily in P2PUniversity both as a teacher and a student. I've taken in classes in Rails and HTML5 Game Development and helped to admin a class on Python 101. More recently I've been working with some PHP-based MVC frameworks - hopefully those frameworks will work their way into my toolbox.

When I'm not doing web-dev I spend my time brewing beer. I'm a certified BJCP judge award winning homebrewer. I've got my sites set on winning at the National Homebrew Competition (even though I got shut-out last year due to EVERY judging location filling up before I entered) - just like every other homebrewer in the country...

I also really like looking at clean code. I wasn't going to write this paragraph; however, when I completed the other paragraphs I went through and made sure every line was <= 100 characters and double spaced - that's right I'm that awesome.
